name: ESPforMe Search Engine
description:
ESPforMe was developed by Scott Rummler in Brooklyn, NY. Scott is also the founder of Laserthread Messenger and BooleanGrid, a stock screener that uses quantum mechanics.

ESPforMe is the first true BCI (Brain-Computer Interface) for iPhone, and the first consumer application of its kind. It represents an advance over efforts by much larger companies, whose projects are in the research stage.
